resources.string: Quick breathing exercise… Breathe deeply and slowly until the time runs out.
Go grab a coffee or take a short walk with someone.
Watch a funny video with a friend
Time for a quick stretch! Try some of these for a few of minutes…
Walk to a friends office and have a quick chat until the time runs out
Cats are hilarious. Check out a few of these and show ones you like to your friends.
Click to see some funny cats!
Enjoy one of these (not so?) funny jokes :)…
SMILE… fake it till you make it!
Ask your friend to make a funny face
Shall we play a short game?
Affirmations always make us feel better. Check some of these out and share them with some friends.
Make the familiar new again. Pick one picture of a mundane object and observe it mindfully for a couple of minutes.
Acceptance is blissful. Write down a stressful incident you encountered with another person, and imagine it flies away and disappears, and then destroy it.
Relax and listen to a simple calming tune…
Share a calm video with family or friends after viewing it yourself.
Do you want to take a break?
Share one of these with friends after viewing it
Remember a beautiful moment in your recent past, close your eyes and remember each detail.
Give somebody a pat on the back for any good reason.
Offload your mind. Write yourself an email with some issue that could wait for later.
Write a friend asking for ideas on how to do something you want or need to accomplish.
Challenge yourself! Replace an unpleasant thought with two pleasant ones. Write the pleasant ones down.
Try to think what new perspective this news brings to your life and share it with someone else
If you can achieve something in the next month, what would it be? - use your personal notepad to write down a reasonably small step towards a goal.
Think about a hard situation a friend/family is going through, and find some alternative solutions online. Send it to them.
Listen carefully with your eyes closed to a new song in a genre you like.
Find two different opinions about a topic and share them with a friend.
Write down a very simple goal you want to accomplish this week on a post it note and place it where you can see it every day.
Make a phone call to a friend and ask for some small advice in some problem you are facing.
Everyone has something they do really well... find an example on your Facebook timeline that showcases one of your strengths.
Learn about active constructive responding and practice with one person
The World is so diverse, learn 3 words in a language you’ve always wanted to learn.
Celebrate with others! Write a positive comment to some friend`s good posting in Facebook
Let us take a moment to travel somewhere
Use a random generator from 1 to your current age and try to remember a good simple memory when you were that age.
Donate to a cause you like or admire
Revise or recall your resume and remember how you survived a difficult work moment
Think about a hard situation a friend/family is going through, and find the strengths that make this person strong… send him/her an email about it.
